name: spez atak
description:
Spez Atak is a game that I am developing for fun. 

You control a spacecraft, and your goal is to destroy as many satallites as possible. Also, there are unlimited satallites, when you destroy one, anoher spawns somewhere else. Gameplay is pretty dry atm, but whatever lol.

CONTROLS

Arrow Keys to move
Left mouse button to use your spacecraft's canons
Middle mouse button to use the minigun
Right mouse button to fire missiles


Enjoy, I guess.
